AI Coachella Valley (AICV) is a static reference site that tracks structured, time-stamped, verifiable signals of AI modernization across the Coachella Valley regional economy. Signals are concise observations designed for retrieval, comparison, and later synthesis into city and sector briefs.

Home: https://aicoachellavalley.com/
Signals: https://aicoachellavalley.com/signals
Cities: https://aicoachellavalley.com/cities
Sectors: https://aicoachellavalley.com/sectors
Framework: https://aicoachellavalley.com/framework
